citations.excerpt:
Organizations must:
- Determine which events require auditing on the system
- Coordinate security audit function with other organizational entities
- Provide rationale for why auditable events are deemed adequate
- Review and update audited events periodically
- Audit events related to successful/unsuccessful account access, account management, object access, policy changes, privilege functions, and system-level events

metadata.summary:
Organizations must:
- Determine which events require auditing on the system
- Coordinate security audit function with other organizational entities
- Provide rationale for why auditable events are deemed adequate
- Review and update audited events periodically
- Audit events related to successful/unsuccessful account access, account management, object access, policy changes, privilege functions, and system-level events

citations.excerpt:
Rules to control physical and logical access to information and other associated assets shall be established and implemented based on business and information security requirements. This includes:
- Access control policy covering all types of access
- Rights of access based on need-to-use principle
- Procedures for granting, reviewing, and revoking access rights
- Documentation of access rights for each user and asset
- Regular review of access rights (at least annually)
- Removal of access...

metadata.summary:
Rules to control physical and logical access to information and other associated assets shall be established and implemented based on business and information security requirements. This includes:
- Access control policy covering all types of access
- Rights of access based on need-to-use principle
- Procedures for granting, reviewing, and revoking access rights
- Documentation of access rights for each user and asset
- Regular review of access rights (at least annually)
- Removal of access rights when employment/contract terminates

metadata.summary:
Rules to control physical and logical access to information and other associated assets shall be established and implemented based on business and information security requirements. This includes:
- Access control policy covering all types of access
- Rights of access based on need-to-use principle
- Procedures for granting, reviewing, and revoking access rights
- Documentation of access rights for each user and asset
- Regular review of access rights (at least annually)
- Removal of access rights when employment/contract terminates
